name: Silentio
description:
Close your eyes, dream of the lights.
Take your time but never too much.
Feel the lone and watch your tone.
Cause there is someone in the dark.

With only a guitar and the power of his music to fight in a world dominated by darkness, will Purrcy be able to cope with his difficult struggle with the arch enemy, which is the main cause of darkness, the darkness that absorbs all the colors and music that is beautiful in the world?

You must dodge the forces of darkness rhythmically with the music at the right time, you compose the music yourself with your movements and this will harm your enemy. Your main goal is never to touch your enemy and stay as far away as possible. If you fail, you become deaf and fall into eternal silence.

This game was produced by 3 people in 72 hours under the scope of Ludum Dare 50th and the Jam's theme was delay the inevitable.
